pr_title: DHFPROD-5094: Make model-writer inherit from common-writer role

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5094: Make model-writer inherit from common-writer role, also add xslt-invoke to common-writer

timeline.bodyText: Just adding the comment here that it was discovered this privilege was needed for validation and hopefully, we'll be expanding validation to all of the writer roles in the future so it makes sense to add it to data-hub-common-writer
timeline.author: ryanjdew
